TEXT.TITLE: METRO AIRLINES <MAIR.O> TO MAKE ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Metro Airlines Inc said it has agreed in principle to acquire privately held Chaparral Airlines inc for 5,700,000 dlrs in cash. Chaparral provides regularly scheduled service out of Dallas/Fort Worth Regional Airport as an affiliated carrier of AMR Corp <AMR> and had revenues in 1986 of 14.1 mln dlrs. Reuter
